Text.Page:
I suppose you've heard the tale of the wondrous powers of unicorn mane? I'm certain it's a popori tale, but I can't convince the others.

If you brought me some manes from {@LinkCreature:28#1011#blackhoof unicorns}, I could debunk the tales once and for all! The unicorns are just along this path south. Can't miss 'em. They're the ones with horns.

That was quick! I'm sure I can use these to prove to many men that such tales are folly.

And at quite a tidy profit, too.

Appreciate your work, . Those unicorns would have turned my belly into a sieve.

I swear on my mother's father's uncle's nephew's cousin's best friend's head that I have only the interests of the public at heart.

Honest.
